ptolemy.homer.widgets

Class ResizableImageWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.api.visual.widget.Widget
      • ptolemy.homer.widgets.ResizableImageWidget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NamedObjectIconWidget, NamedObjectImageWidget

    public class ResizableImageWidget
extends org.netbeans.api.visual.widget.Widget
    A fork of ImageWidget with a fix to support resize-ability. Based on bug report http://netbeans.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=170884 and article http://java.dzone.com/news/how-add-resize-functionality-v A widget representing image. The origin of the widget is at its top-left corner.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 10.0
    Version:
    $Id$, $Id$
    Author:
    David Kaspar
